question:
Consider the following:
  1. Krishi Kalyan Cess
  2. Infrastructure Cess
  3. Swachh Bharat Cess
  4. Clean Environment Cess
Which of the above has/have been introduced in Union budget 2016-17?
explanation: Swachh Bharat Cess was introduced in 2015. Clean Energy Cess was renamed as Clean Environment Cess in budget 2016-17. Krishi Kalyan Cess and Infrastructure Cess were introduced in Union budget 2016-17.
